resources.string: "Hi my name is Taha.\nI am a software engineer interested in web, Android, and embedded development. Currently I work at First Hawaiian bank where I work with a sizable IT team to implement software projects and troubleshoot production software issues for over 50 branches.\nSoftware design is my passion. I am currently learning more about AI and hope to be a contributor to the field."
"* Programmer at First Hawaiian Bank\n* Programmer at University of Hawaii"
